dmca.title: Planet customer posts Hostgator images on eBay auction; gets notice
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, April 29, 2005 8:06 PM
To: Copyright Compliance
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


- -------- Original Message --------
From: - Fri Apr 29 19:58:28 2005
X-Mozilla-Status: 0001
X-Mozilla-Status2: 00000000
Received: from [172.16.214.181] (helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)        by
mail
with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)        (Exim 4.50)        id
1DReu6-0002jq-M1        for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Fri, 29 Apr 2005
18:28:14 -0500
Received: from mail.inside.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.110]
helo=[216.185.111.52])        by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)        with esmtp (Exim)        id
1DReu5-000F14-10; Fri, 29 Apr 2005 18:28:14 -0500
Received: from [172.16.214.180] (helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com)        by
mail
with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim 4.50)        id
1DReu3-0002je-RN        for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 29 Apr 2005 18:28:11
-0500
Received: from gator.hostgator.com ([67.18.54.2])        by
mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from Kristi@Hostgator.com)        with
esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1DRetz-000JB3-2z        for
abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 29 Apr 2005 18:28:11 -0500
Received: from pcp0011050616pcs.sabrna01.az.comcast.net
([69.137.191.26]:4596        helo=supportijtc8bd) by gator.hostgator.com with
smtp (Exim 4.50)        id 1DReu0-0001Ub-OJ; Fri, 29 Apr 2005 18:28:08 -0500
From: <Kristi@Hostgator.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Fri, 29 Apr 2005 16:28:06 -0700
Message-ID: <BPEPLIIIBJKODJCCDDGLEEACCAAA.Kristi@Hostgator.com>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain;        charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Priority: 3 (Normal)
X-MSMail-Priority: Normal
X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook IMO, Build 9.0.2416 (9.0.2910.0)
Importance: Normal
X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2800.1441
X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse,        please include it
with any abuse report
X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - gator.hostgator.com
X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - theplanet.com
X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [47 12] / [47 12]
X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - Hostgator.com
X-Source:
X-Source-Args:
X-Source-Dir:
Received-SPF: none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 67.18.54.2 is neither
permitted        nor denied by domain of Hostgator.com) client-ip=67.18.54.2;
envelope-from=Kristi@Hostgator.com; helo=gator.hostgator.com;
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -99.8
Cc: brent@hostgator.com
Subject: [ABUSE] copyright infringement
X-BeenThere: abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.5
Precedence: list
List-Id: abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post: <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help: <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -99.8

To Whom It May Concern:

A client of The Planet is currently advertising an ebay auction at
http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&category=194&item=5189306177

The table and it's graphics being used on this auction are stolen from
hostgator.com.  They can be found at
http://www.hostgator.com/resellers.shtml

The abusers whois info is:

http://www.whois.sc/get-cheap-hosting.com

http://www.dnsstuff.com/tools/whois.ch?ip=67.19.241.114

http://www.dnsreport.com/tools/dnsreport.ch?domain=get-cheap-hosting.com


Thanks,

Kristi
Hostgator.com
